inclusion.criterion: ICU patients with successful resuscitation after out-hospital or in-hospital
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute or history of neurological disorder: stroke, bleeding, trauma,
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Severe dementia, psychiatric or neuromuscular disability
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of CAD and severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery, but no other cardiovascular risk factors. He is physically active and reported no use of lipid-lowering medications.
